ArticleTitle.sentence: RFLAT-1: a new zinc finger transcription factor that activates RANTES gene expression in T lymphocytes.

event.clue: RFLAT-1: a new zinc finger transcription factor that activates RANTES gene expression in T lymphocytes.
RFLAT-1: a new zinc finger transcription factor that activates RANTES gene expression in T lymphocytes.

AbstractText.sentence: RANTES (Regulated upon Activation, Normal T cell Expressed and Secreted) is a chemoattractant cytokine (chemokine) important in the generation of inflammatory infiltrate and human immunodeficiency virus entry into immune cells.

event.clue: RANTES (Regulated upon Activation, Normal T cell Expressed and Secreted) is a chemoattractant cytokine (chemokine) important in the generation of inflammatory infiltrate and human immunodeficiency virus entry into immune cells.

RANTES (Regulated upon Activation, Normal T cell Expressed and Secreted) is a chemoattractant cytokine (chemokine) important in the generation of inflammatory infiltrate and human immunodeficiency virus entry into immune cells.

AbstractText.sentence: RANTES is expressed late (3-5 days) after activation in T lymphocytes.

event.clue: RANTES is expressed late (3-5 days) after activation in T lymphocytes.
RANTES is expressed late (3-5 days) after activation in T lymphocytes.

AbstractText.sentence: Using expression cloning, we identified the first "late" T lymphocyte associated transcription factor and named it "RANTES Factor of Late Activated T Lymphocytes-1" (RFLAT-1).
RFLAT-1 is a novel, phosphorylated, zinc finger transcription factor that is expressed in T cells 3 days after activation, coincident with RANTES expression.

event.clue: RFLAT-1 is a novel, phosphorylated, zinc finger transcription factor that is expressed in T cells 3 days after activation, coincident with RANTES expression.

AbstractText.sentence: While Rel proteins play the dominant role in RANTES gene expression in fibroblasts, RFLAT-1 is a strong transactivator for RANTES in T cells.

event.clue: While Rel proteins play the dominant role in RANTES gene expression in fibroblasts, RFLAT-1 is a strong transactivator for RANTES in T cells.
